recommendations.title: If You’re Nostalgic for Nokia, See the Devices That Defined ’90s Cellphone Design in a New Online Archive
recommendations.excerpt: The iconic brand’s mobile phones were pop culture mainstays. Soon, a new online archive will bring together thousands of documents, early models and design concepts

recommendations.title: 11 Times Indian Food Shone Globally in 2024: A Year in Review
recommendations.excerpt: Year Ender 2024: Indian chefs and restaurants - not only in the country but across the world - are shining a global spotlight on Indian food in different ways. In 2024, many establishments won prestigious awards.

recommendations.title: The Struggles of Pet Owners No One Talks About in India
recommendations.excerpt: When 20-year-old art student Gargy Sharma from Delhi finally convinced her parents to go on a long-awaited family outing, she was thrilled. More than for herself, she was excited for Cheddar, her 2-year-old poodle, as it was his birthday month.

recommendations.title: Australia Frustrated As India Avoid Follow-on on Quirky Day Four of Brisbane Test
recommendations.excerpt: It’s that time again. Not the time when the cricket enthusiasts are paying attention, because we always are – June in Barbados, August in Galle, whatever you’ve got.

recommendations.title: Amazon to Create a Total of 2 Mn Jobs in India by 2025
recommendations.excerpt: Amazon claimed that it has created 1.4 million direct and indirect jobs in India in the last four years and was currently on track to create another 6 lakhs jobs to take the total jobs count to 2 million in the country by 2025.

recommendations.title: Decoding India’s ‘One Nation, One Election’ Plan
recommendations.excerpt: India, the world's largest democracy, is almost always in election mode. With 28 states, eight union territories and nearly a billion eligible voters, polls are a constant feature of the nation's political landscape.

recommendations.title: 10 Breathtaking Indian Homes of 2024 Loved by AD Editors

recommendations.title: India’s Fortunes Shift in Bangladesh
